snippet.title: V Rising - Legacy of Castlevania Gameplay Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about V Rising: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1604030/V_Rising/

Swedish game developer Stunlock Studios with Konami Digital Entertainment (KONAMI) have today released the first gameplay trailer for V Rising — Legacy of Castlevania. This crossover collaboration is set to release on May 8th alongside V Rising’s much-anticipated full release on Steam; with the PS5 version launching later this year. The trailer was also part of the Triple-i Initiative showcase, a digital event founded by Dead Cells liveops developer, Evil Empire.

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Website: https://iii-initiative.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG-chdE8x9az-eyO0Gflr6Q 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 

About The Triple-i Initiative:

The Triple-i Initiative is a new collaborative effort to highlight fan-favorite games and hype up established indie classics as well as new IPs. The Initiative is backed by strong independent studios such as Evil Empire, Red Hook, Mega Crit Games, Poncle, Stunlock Studios, Thunder Lotus, Re- Logic, Ghostship Games, Extremely OK Games, Heart Machine and more.
